title: Daily Briefing: Joe Biden has cancer
shortDescription: The former president has one of the worst forms of prostate cancer. Here is the news to know on Monday.

title: Biden's post-presidency: From talking Social Security to appearing on 'The View'
shortDescription: After maintaining a low profile since leaving the White House, former President Joe Biden recently emerged with media interviews and an April speech.

title: Russia launches Ukraine war's largest drone attack ahead of Putin-Trump call
shortDescription: Russia launched its largest drone attack on Ukraine since the start of the war, before President Donald Trump is due to discuss a proposed ceasefire with Vladimir Putin.

title: Democrats push Trump to eliminate Wall Street tax break he's long targeted
shortDescription: The letter comes as congressional Republicans craft a tax package that does not include the change.

title: Trump tax bill passes in key US House committee vote
shortDescription: The approval on May 18 advances the measure toward possible passage in the House of Representatives later this week.

title: Kamala Harris wishes Joe Biden speedy recovery after cancer diagnosis
shortDescription: 'I know he will face this challenge with the same strength, resilience, and optimism that have always defined his life," Harris said of Biden.

title: Biden diagnosed with prostate cancer
shortDescription: Former President Joe Biden has been diagnosed with an "aggressive" form of prostate cancer.

title: Trump wishes Biden 'fast' recovery after cancer diagnosis
shortDescription: 'We extend our warmest and best wishes to Jill and the family, and we wish Joe a fast and successful recovery,' Trump and his wife said.

title: Deportations under wartime law blocked by Supreme Court | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Vice President JD Vance will attend Pope Leo XIV's inaugural mass. Plus, some workers are job hopping for fertility benefits. It's all on The Excerpt.

title: Joe Biden diagnosed with 'aggressive form' of prostate cancer
shortDescription: 'This represents a more aggressive form of the disease," a Biden spokesman said in a statement.

title: Vance, Zelenskyy meet in Rome as Trump pushes for Ukraine peace deal
shortDescription: Vance and Zelenskyy clashed during an Oval Office meeting in February. Trump is speaking to Zelenskyy and Russian President Vladimir Putin on May 19.

title: Walmart may pass some tariff costs to shoppers, Trump treasury secretary says
shortDescription: Earlier this week, Trump told Walmart it should "eat the tariffs" he is imposing on foreign imports.

title: Mike Pence: Donald Trump accepting a Qatari jet is a 'bad idea'
shortDescription: Trump's former vice president said there are national security and constitutional concerns with the gift.

title: Trump admin reverses Biden, allows 'forced reset triggers' for semiautomatic rifles
shortDescription: The Trump administration is permitting the sale of devices that let gun enthusiasts convert semiautomatic rifles into weapons that can shoot as fast as machine guns.

title: Coming soon: big Supreme Court decisions on Trump, religion, transgender care
shortDescription: The Supreme Court is deciding major cases about the ability to block Trump's policies, religious rights and gender affirming care for minors.

title: 'Big Beautiful Deportations': Trump team pivots on 'stalled' bill
shortDescription: "Put simply, The Big Beautiful Bill will empower Big Beautiful Deportations," the White House said May 17 in a press release after the bill stalled.

title: This is what remains of a Melania Trump statue
shortDescription: A bronze statue of Melania Trump has gone missing in her home country of Slovenia, five years after it replaced a wooden statue that was burned.

title: 'Eat the tariffs.' Trump tells Walmart not to pass on price increases
shortDescription: 'Eat the tariffs' Trump tells Walmart in a social media post warning the company not to blame them for price increases

title: Trump to speak with presidents of Russia and Ukraine after peace talks
shortDescription: Trump announced he will speak Monday by phone with Putin and Zelenskyy days after peace talks in Istanbul end with planned prisoner exchange

title: Biden struggles to remember dates in Hur interview - audiotape

title: White House communications director Cheung criticizes Moody's downgrade

title: Trump says former FBI Director James Comey's post 'meant assassination'
shortDescription: Asked if Comey should be in jail, Trump demurred and said he would let U.S. Attorney General Pam Bondi handle the decision.

title: Flat Earth on the ballot? Debunked claim pops up in politics.
